EmailTemplate.subject: Here's the link to the webinar you requested.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest Hello {{lead.First Name}},
Click the link below to view the “Malware in IoT, Crypto-coins & Smart Devices - prevention and appropriate action” webinar recording.
To download the full Threat Intelligence Report click here <[[https://pages.nokia.com/T003B6-Threat-Intelligence-Report-2019.html]]>
You can find more information on our Threat Intelligence Center page <[[https://networks.nokia.com/solutions/threat-intelligence]]> and to learn more about our Security solutions visit our website <[[https://networks.nokia.com/solutions/security]]> VIEW THE WEBINAR <[[https://{{my.AssetURL}}]]> © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
